title: Weeb Website
description: Responsive landing page for a product based on a mock-up with Figma.
goals: Implements designs created in Figma using modern web technologies.
Meets all the requirements of responsive design.
Provides fast loading on all devices.
Intuitive and user-friendly layout.

title: Developer Portfolio
description: A modern portfolio showcasing fullstack projects, certificates, and personal background with dynamic routing and theming.
features: Contact form with spinner and modal
challenges: Managing conditional routing and dynamic template rendering
State management between filters and views
Dark mode theming across components
Form submission handling and user feedback

title: React Todo App
description: A simple todo application built with React that allows users to manage their daily tasks.
features: Sort tasks by date or title
challenges: Managing local component state for multiple interactions
Implementing controlled forms and validation
Creating a clean and accessible modal for editing tasks
Handling dynamic list rendering and updates

title: Sincos Admin Panel
description: Admin dashboard application built with Laravel and Blade templates to manage products and users.
architecture: MVC pattern with server-side rendering using Blade. RESTful routing and resource controllers for clean backend logic.
challenges: Customizing Blade layouts and partials for UI consistency
Integrating Tailwind with Laravel asset pipeline
Implementing secure CRUD operations for users and products
Consuming external DummyJSON API for dynamic content
Configuring and styling Laravel's pagination with Tailwind

title: Notes App with Vanilla PHP
description: Educational project that demonstrates building a CRUD app using pure PHP with custom routing, middleware, and views.
architecture: MVC-like architecture with manual routing (routes.php), separation of concerns using Core classes, and server-side rendering with reusable PHP views.
challenges: Building a router from scratch to handle GET/POST requests
Implementing middleware logic for protected routes
Structuring reusable view components (partials)
Designing secure session-based login system
Handling validation and form errors manually

title: Laravel First Project
description: Educational Laravel app with routing, controllers, Blade templates, migrations, and model relationships.
architecture: MVC pattern with route/controller binding, Blade views for server-side rendering, Eloquent models for data access, and database migrations.
security: Form validation via Request classes or controllers
challenges: Understanding controller/view separation
Working with Blade inheritance and layouts
Building database relationships with Eloquent
Handling user input and validation
Structuring routes for RESTful behavior

title: Accessibility fundamentals and HTML semantic
description: A learning-focused landing page project aimed at applying accessibility principles and semantic HTML structure.
goals: Replaced non-semantic HTML tags with appropriate semantic elements such as <header>, <nav>, <main>, <section>, <article>, <aside>, and <footer>.
Ensured only a single <h1> heading is used for the main article title, with proper heading hierarchy for all other titles.
Added descriptive alt text to all images to enhance screen reader accessibility.
Wrapped relevant images in <figure> and added <figcaption> for additional context.
Updated external links to open in new tabs using the target attribute, improving navigation for users.
Removed redundant role attributes where semantic elements already implied the role.
Reinforced best practices for modern, accessible web layout using real examples.

title: CSS Transform and Animation Playground
description: A learning-focused landing page project showcasing advanced use of CSS animations and transform/transition techniques across 10 distinct visual blocks.
goals: Created a 'bgcolor' animation for background-color transition over 5 seconds using custom keyframes.
Implemented 'bgcolor2' animation with multiple color transitions at defined keyframe percentages.
Built 'blockmove' animation to move the block through a square path using left and top properties.
Created 'blockcolormove' combining position and color animation, with delay, repetition, and reset.
Designed 'showhide' animation to loop opacity from 1 to 0 infinitely.
Reused 'blockmove' on a new block with reverse direction and adjusted duration.
Applied 'blockcolormove' in alternate-reverse infinite mode with faster speed.
Introduced 'moveleft' animation to shift blocks horizontally using left property.
Modified 'moveleft' to run with constant linear speed.
Applied 'moveleft' with easing (`ease-out`) and final keyframe persistence (`forwards`).

title: CSS Layout and Multi-Column Design
description: A layout-focused landing page project built using CSS float-based structure and multi-column techniques, following a strict mock-up specification.
goals: Positioned <aside> on the right and <main> on the left using CSS float properties.
Applied fixed width values to header, footer, main, and aside to follow the mock-up layout.
Made the .header_line section stay fixed at the top of the page using position: fixed and top: 0.
Changed box-sizing model globally using body selector to include paddings and borders in element dimensions.
Used CSS multi-column layout (column-count and column-gap) to split content in .client_stories into three columns with 20px gap.
Applied column-span: all to h2 headings to span across all columns in multi-column layout.

title: CSS Selectors Task
description: A learning-focused CSS project that applies a wide range of selectors including basic, combinator, pseudo-classes, and pseudo-elements, all within a strict HTML structure.
goals: Styled the <body> tag with a global font stack including Arial, Helvetica, and sans-serif.
Applied padding and a dark blue border to the #main-header element.
Styled .main-heading with italic font and underlined dotted text decoration.
Added spacing to all <section> elements using padding and margin-top.
Styled specific sections (.tech, .spaceflight, .science-astronomy) with custom borders using class selectors.
Targeted nested <h2> inside .tech and styled them with dark grey color.
Styled a direct child <h2> of <header> with left padding and border.
Applied a border to a <nav> that directly follows an <h1>.
Styled .main-footer when it follows #main-header at the same DOM level using general sibling selector.
Styled a <ul> that is a direct child of .main-navigation with list reset and padding.
Applied different borders to the first and last <li> items in an <ol>.
Styled <a> tags inside .main-footer on hover with yellowgreen text color.
Applied yellow background on focused <a> links.
Added ::before pseudo-element to <h2> inside .tech with '🤖' content.
Added ::after pseudo-element to direct child <h2> in .spaceflight with '🚀' content.

title: HTML Forms and Interactive Elements
description: A structured HTML form created with semantic and accessible markup, demonstrating label associations, grouped inputs, datalist usage, and collapsible sections using <details>.
goals: Wrapped each input and its label text inside <label> tags for proper semantic structure.
Added specific name attributes to each <input> including full-name, address, and email.
Set the correct input type for the email field.
Grouped degree radio inputs inside <fieldset> with a <legend> element titled 'University Degree'.
Assigned value and name attributes to each degree option (military, technical, student).
Added a <textarea> inside #bio-p and linked it to a <label> using id and for attributes.
Created a collapsible section using <details> and <summary> with the correct expandable content.
Added a color picker input inside #uniform-color-p with appropriate label and name.
Created a text input inside #preferred-mission-role-p linked to a <datalist> with ordered role options.
Added a checkbox inside #agree-and-submit wrapped with label 'I agree on terms and conditions'.
Inserted a <button> of type='submit' with label 'Send your data to NASA'.

title: HTML Text elements
description: A project focused on transforming raw HTML content into fully semantic and accessible structure using correct headings, lists, date/time, and formatting tags.
goals: Replaced generic <div> elements with proper headings: <h1> for page title, <h2> for articles, and <h3> for sections.
Added ordered and unordered lists for crew members and flight directors to reflect actual data.
Marked a specific date and time with a <time> tag including datetime attribute: 1969-07-20T20:17:00.000Z.
Wrapped NASA acronym with <abbr> tag and full form via title attribute.
Used <blockquote> and <cite> to semantically tag John F. Kennedy's historical quote and its source.
Emphasized Armstrong’s quote using <em> and marked citation link with <sup>.
Italicized three distinct text fragments to highlight secondary or stylistic meaning.

title: Introduction to css basic
description: A beginner-level project focused on applying CSS styling through external, internal, and inline methods, with practice on typography, layout, and links.
goals: Linked an external stylesheet (style.css) in the <head> using a properly formed <link> tag.
Added a <style> tag as the first child of <body> containing rules for <nav> layout and borders.
Applied an inline style to the <h2> inside <nav> with text-transform and text-decoration.
Styled <body> with Arial/Helvetica font stack and 16px font size.
Styled all <h2> tags with 1.5rem size and #303030 color.

Styled all

tags with 18px font size.
Applied bold, italic, darkslategrey text to elements with class .quote.
Added a 5px slateblue border to the element with id #main-image.
Styled ordered lists with upper-roman list style.
Styled all links: default color dodgerblue, visited color violet, hover color mediumseagreen.

title: Links and Images
description: A dual-purpose project that implements a semantic navigation menu and a responsive image layout using the <picture> element and media queries.
goals: Created a navigation menu inside the <header> with four links in a strict order: Home, About, Gallery, and Help.
Linked Home to index.html, Gallery to gallery.html, and Help to https://www.w3.org/ using target='_blank'.
Linked About using a fragment identifier (anchor) to id='about' on the same page.
Used the <picture> element inside gallery.html to display different images based on screen width.
Configured responsive image sources: pic1.jpg (≤ 480px), pic2.jpg (≤ 780px), pic3.jpg (≤ 1024px), pic4.jpg (default).
Included appropriate alt text 'Beauty of Nature' for accessibility.

title: Tabular Data Representation
description: A hands-on semantic HTML project that involves presenting structured shopping data in a table using correct markup, spanning, and grouping techniques.
goals: Built a semantic HTML table using <table>, <caption>, <thead>, <tbody>, and <tfoot>.
Added a table caption: 'Shop list for 25th of May'.
Used <th scope='col'> for each column header to ensure accessibility.
Grouped 'Price' and 'Amount (kilo)' columns using <colgroup> and individual <col> elements.
Used rowspan='2' for the 'Name' column to span two rows vertically.
Created a visual grouping by merging three header cells into a single 'Purchases' label using colspan='3'.
Displayed a 'Total' row with colspan='2' to span across relevant cells in the footer.

title: Useful css rules
description: A project that focuses on applying advanced CSS styling rules to sections, headers, quotes, contact icons, tables, and footer areas using gradients, shadows, pseudo-elements, and precise selectors.
goals: Styled .main-quote with custom margins, font styles, size, and color.
Applied a gradient background, purple fallback color, white text, and full padding to .main-header.
Used background image and padding for .avatar-figure and added solid border to its child.
Styled .contacts list with padding, max width, white border, and white text; <li> items displayed inline.
Applied :visited and :active color styling to links with .contact class.
Used ::before pseudo-elements to add background icons for contact-phone, contact-inst, and contact-twitter.
Styled <h1> with bottom padding and border.
Added 2rem padding to all <section> tags and shadow to .summary section.
Set float, size, margin, and border-radius for .space element with layered background images.
Styled .work-experience section with top margin and applied 100% width + collapsed borders to <table>.
Defined column widths for .work-experience-* columns using <col>.
Styled <th> and <td> with spacing, alignment, and text color.
Styled <tfoot> <th> with right-aligned text and applied background/text shadow to <thead> and <tfoot>.
Styled <caption> with padding, italic, letter spacing, and right alignment, positioned at table bottom.
Applied gradient background, white text, and padding to .main-footer.
